recommendations: Muskaan Gupta “Srishti is an exceptional branding professional with a remarkable ability to transform complex brand narratives into powerful visual identities. Her conceptual approach to logo design goes beyond aesthetics, demonstrating a profound understanding of strategic brand communication. What sets her apart is her creativity and deep insight – she doesn't just design logos, she crafts visual stories that capture the essence of a brand. Her work is innovative, purposeful, and consistently impressive. I wholeheartedly recommend Srishti for any organization seeking a designer who can elevate brand identity through truly inspired creative thinking.”

LinkedIn User “Srishti’s design talent is truly one of a kind—fresh, innovative, and unforgettable. She gave The Energy Company’s logo a creative twist that beautifully captured the brand’s essence. What sets her apart is her ability to blend originality with a keen sense of what makes a design stand out. If you’re looking for someone who can transform your vision into something extraordinary, Srishti is the designer to call!”
